Text: VPN access for your departmentBarry In order to get Kim Ward VPN access from her ome or nonenron PC I will need you to email my manager Paige Cox with the number of people in your group that need to work from home and the business reason behing it Once Paige gets approval I will be able to assist Kim and the rest of your group get the VPN access from thier homes Thanks Pablo S Torres Team Lead st and nd Floor Trader Support Group Phone Pager Cell EMail

Status Update VPN Access from homeKim The EConnect Project is still underway and will probably be in production by the end of this month EConnect will be the newest way to connect to Enrons network from home or when traveling However attached is the instructions for an alternate way to connect to Enron These instructions have been approved by my boss They are selfinstall instructions but since we are such good friends I do not mind helping you out If you need help setting up your ome PC andor VPN access to Enron feel free to give me a call to schedule a time for a home install I will be doing a home install for Mike Grigsby tomorrow around PM He is in the Westheimer and Kirby area so depending on where your live and if time permits I can help you as well You can also give me a call and I can help you out over the phone You will need to have the BlackIce Software available for the second set of instructions This CD was sent to all ome customers in a blue folderpacket with a mousepad I can give you a CD with just about everything youll need tomorrow Thanks Pablo S Torres Team Lead st and nd Floor Trader Support Group Phone Pager Cell EMail
